name: Thore Cash
description:
TCH describes itself as a global utility token that aims to offer superior rates on digital assets. According to the team, users that hold $1000 worth of TCH on the ThoreNetwork will receive a range of benefits. Thorecash aims to make crypto-lending and investments accessible to the masses.

The team aims to create a blockchain-based protocol that will allow investors to lend in any crypto. The ThoreCash network aims to connect fundraisers to investors with similar goals. The use of a distributed ledger is intended to create a permanent record of lending and borrowing interactions on the platform while eliminating the costs associated with intermediaries to enable smaller scale investments. TCH hopes to create a digital environment for lending/borrowing and trading blockchain-based financial assets,
